author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: I mentioned to my wife about the use of American Indian languages for coded messages and she wondered whether in the UK we used Welsh. My thought was that there are Welsh speakers in Patagonia which may compromise things but dialects such as geordie or glaswegian would be incomprehensible to foreigners. In fact I can’t understand some of what my wife’s relatives are saying when they are talking amongst themselves in Devon.
